conbody.p: The user interface domain elements are designed for documenting the user interface of a sw program.

dlentry.dd:
user interface control
Click File and select New to launch the New Project dialog.

cascading a menu
Click File New to launch the New Project dialog.

Window title
Click File New to launch the New Project dialog.

Shortcut
Click File New to launch the New Project dialog. Alternatively, press Ctrl+N keys.
